abstract: A growing body of research has found that sleep apnea can be a drain on intimacy, causing erectile dysfunction in men and loss of libido in women.
snippet: A growing body of research has found that sleep apnea can be a drain on intimacy, causing erectile dysfunction in men and loss of libido in women.

headline.main: Really? The Claim: Sleep Apnea Causes Sexual Problems
headline.print_headline: The Claim: Sleep apnea causes sexual dysfunction.
